lead_paragraph: Officials investigating the cause of a huge oil spill  along a major river in southern Michigan say damage to wetlands and wildlife may last considerably longer.
snippet: Officials investigating the cause of a huge oil spill  along a major river in southern Michigan say damage to wetlands and wildlife may last considerably longer.

headline.main: Officials Say Midwest Spill Will Take Months to Clean
headline.seo: Officials Say Michigan Spill Will Take Months to Clean Up
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Midwest Spill Will Take Months to Clean
